page.title: 07Village hooliganism
page.content: Easlier this year trouble broke out between the village youths and youths from Bradley.The Bradley youths came into the village looking for trouble and they fought the Laceby youths led by Justin Quickfall,better known as Juggers,with sticks.The police quickly came and sorted them out and Juggers was arrested for obstructing the pavement and spent the night in goal. The following day it was rumoured that more trouble was coming and the police toured the village.They arranged a game of rounders on the playing field and there was no trouble. There was even trouble between Laceby youths following the end of this years Cup Final but again police quickly sorted it out. Today Laceby is as quiet as it usually is.
